website_summaries.verdict: While it isn't quite as good as the Beats Studio wireless, Sony's MDR-ZX770BN is a quality Bluetooth headphone and costs significantly less.
pros: The Sony MDR-ZX770BN is a well-designed Bluetooth headphone, sounds good for the money, is comfortable to wear, and has active noise-cancellation with three ANC modes
It can be used as a wired headphone with the noise-canceling on
cons: Doesn't quite have the look and feel of a premium headphone
the three sound modes introduce more confusion than convenience

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: After having these for a while, i can definitely recommend. Comfortable after long periods of wear, good noise cancelling. only bad thing is that the light is supposed to flash blue and red when it's pairing, which is super confusing because traditionally a red light means low battery. this means it's really hard to tell when the headphones actually have low battery. basically, it's when they stop working: not super helpful.
customer_reviews.author: madelineraynor

customer_reviews.title: Home run.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones by Sony! I was looking for noise canceling Bluetooth headphones and these seemed like a good option. I have been nothing but impressed since. Noise canceling is good, maybe not awesome, but very nice for traveling (driving, flying, trains). Audio quality is good as well, they're not mixing headphones so don't use them for that. Very comfortable. 9/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product, a little weak in NC
customer_reviews.text: I have used for about a week, some thoughts. Before purchasing, I really wanted to have both noise cancelling and Bluetooth feature, however not many products provided both of them. After some research I chose this product, it also have a nice modern look which I like. Pros: Music quality. Confortable. Battery life. Cons: The only "cons" I need to write is its noise cancelling feature is not as perfect as I expected. I have tried on Bose QC 25 in store, feels better than this product. But I never did compare at the same time, and considering the price difference, this is good enough. Would be more as a 4.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Xin He

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest reasonable pair of BT & NC headphones (for which there are surprisingly few options)
customer_reviews.text: The headphones themselves came as advertised, which is certainly above acceptable. Seller claimed it would ship with original accessories, which turned out to be false (they included an auxiliary cable that's literally 6" long; I'm never going to use it but I couldn't if I wanted to). Overall, you get what you pay for with these cans-- won't be surprised either way
customer_reviews.author: A. Jeng

customer_reviews.title: Delivered Broken
customer_reviews.text: Thought i would save a few bucks and buy the Sony. Hoping i would get these and they would sound awesome and everthing would live happily ever after... Merry Christmas morning and the left side speaker not working. Returned and refunded. Bought a bose and havent been disappointed. Need better quality assurance. Get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lee Shea

customer_reviews.title: The wireless reception via Bluetooth is very good, sound quality exceptional, noise cancelling subpar
customer_reviews.text: This is well designed and built product. The wireless reception via Bluetooth is very good, and the sound quality is exceptional. The only issue is that the noise cancelling is sub par. It will even out the sound of an air vent (low frequency), but sudden bursts (or high frequency) will be clearly audible. Does not compare well to Bose, but at a lower price it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: LIVIA

customer_reviews.title: Not the Sony  quality I was expecting...
customer_reviews.text: The noise canceling function only worked with a headphone jack plugged into the headphone plug - this is ridiculous as the noise canceling should work without this. The battery stopped holding a charge after about 12 months. The controls are finicky. I returned these to Sony with a letter telling them this and all they offered was for me to spend more of my money and buy a new pair. Buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ideal
customer_reviews.text: To start, I am no audio fanatic. I bought these mainly for travel as I spend a lot of time on the plane. I love my music and I wanted something that would provide me with a good level of sound quality and drown out the noise of the engines at the same time. Perhaps the BOSE provide a higher level of noise cancellation quality but they do not offer wireless and NC in one package. These are perfect and exactly what I was expecting from SONY with out breaking a bank
customer_reviews.author: Marek Wasilewski

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones, use them on my city commute every day. Very comfortable fit, no pressure from the headband. I drive them from my phone which is in my pocket but i've never had any issues with bluetooth dropping or interference. I'm no audiophile though so i can't speak about quality, but i dont notice any audio degradation. Noise cancelling definitely makes a difference on the bus.
customer_reviews.author: S. Saha

customer_reviews.title: quality & feel is nice voice quality is fine
customer_reviews.text: Product functions well, quality & feel is nice voice quality is fine, noise cancellation is ok ok. Whats mentioned by others in the reviews is actually true on noise cancellation; btw on and off you will find roughly 50% difference in the outside voice. Not bad on price point relative to others.
customer_reviews.author: rayo49

customer_reviews.title: Would have liked the noise cancelling to be better
customer_reviews.text: Would have liked the noise cancelling to be better. Can still hear quite a bit. It only gets rid of background buzzing/humming of fridges and AC. But SQ is really really good! If noise cancelling is your priority then go Bose. If SQ with a little bit of noise cancelling is what you want, these are it
customer_reviews.author: A. Samba

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality, Sound, and Noise Canceling!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter lives in a noisy dorm, and she couldn't be happier with the quality and effectiveness of these headphones. She has thanked me more than once for buying them for her.
customer_reviews.author: D Hunt

customer_reviews.title: would buy again,
customer_reviews.text: still testing but so far they are doing the job. They don't reduce all the noise but I've heard there are different levels of noise cancellation. To me, the sound just fine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Petty

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these with the hopes of using them at my office. The bluetooth didn't work, and then when I finally just decided to use the jack the sound was awful. They obviously sent me ones that didn't work, but it was too late to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Jen M

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Use them while mowing the lawn. Battery life seems to be excellent, and they connect easily to my droid phone. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Noise cancellation is not a good as the Bose 35 but decent
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancellation is not a good as the Bose 35 but decent. Draw back for me is that it has trouble remembering my Macbook. Would have to remove and reconnect every so often.
customer_reviews.author: J Y

customer_reviews.title: These headphones rock.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great. They're comfortable, have a good battery with LED indicators, and the noise cancelling feature does the job. Sound is balanced, with a little bass boost but not too much like the beats. I'm an ear musician, and a good pair of headphones became a need for me after a while.. These ones are perfect and not overpriced.. Totally what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Guillermo Marrero Cruz

customer_reviews.title: THEY WORK GREAT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: There are the exact headphones i wanted at a great price. Just to let you know thou they came with a grey inside, not a blue inside but to be honest that is what i really wanted so perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Holt

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff. The noise cancellation is decent
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. The noise cancellation is decent. Does not block out all noise. Even if it did it would feel like suction cups on your ears. The sound quality for Bluetooth is fantastic. Watch YouTube vids on these cans as I did before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel

customer_reviews.title: not so great for music - too heavy on the bass and ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. No microphone input, so it's sensitive to wind and there's no way around it. Also, not so great for music - too heavy on the bass and light on the highs. But for a conversation headset out of the wind it works great.
customer_reviews.author: RositaMike

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected but it didnt include all the accessories that should have.
customer_reviews.author: Chop!

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones. Noise cancelling is very good - effectively ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. Noise cancelling is very good - effectively cancels white noise, while other sounds, like people talking can still be heard. Had to return first set due to high-pitch tone.
customer_reviews.author: d t

customer_reviews.title: headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. I'm not liking the turn on and off buttons and what the lights mean.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying these headphones. My first pair with NC, so I can't really assess its relative quality, but it is working well enough for my purposes. Extremely comfortable to wear, usually for hours at a time. AptX is nice, when paired with my Nexus 9. Pairs easily in Ubuntu and Arch Linux, and recognized under the correct profile (A2DP). Calls can be hit or miss, but this may be due to me being a mumbler. Battery life currently at about 1.5 days in my normal usage, I think. Build quality balanced between solidness and lightweight for comfort. At the price I paid, 5 stars. Not sure if I'd have ever paid the full MSRP for these, however. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James E.

customer_reviews.title: He can sit out on the porch or anywhere and it is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. He loves it. He can sit out on the porch or anywhere and it is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Stern

customer_reviews.title: Great sound !
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for husband. He loves them !
customer_reviews.author: Diana Haas

customer_reviews.title: but they sound great. I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: They don't cancel noise as well as Bose, but they sound great. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great Great Headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I have this headphones for almost 1 year. Are good, excellents. Great sound, good bluetooth and the noise cancelling works great. I used in almost every divices i had, laptop, smartphone, tablet, ipad. And not problem at all. Also are very confortable. I recomended.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Decerega Valderrama

customer_reviews.title: It's the best. I recommend everyone to try it out
customer_reviews.text: It's the best. I recommend everyone to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Beautiful

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is amazing. And the NC is impressive.
customer_reviews.author: JustEd

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of use out of these headphones several times a week. They are comfortable, the battery lasts for hours, and they are reliable. The reason I'm giving three stars is because the sound quality is not very premium, it sounds reasonable if you're not big into really great sounding headphones. My second gripe is bigger. The effectiveness of the noise canceling is less than I expected. It doesn't eliminate any sound, it only reduces it a little. It's better than nothing on an airplane or in the office.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: A bit heavy and a bit warm on hot days ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit heavy and a bit warm on hot days ... but otherwise just what I wanted. Noise cancelling and bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: The jack where the headphones goes barely keeps the cable ...
customer_reviews.text: The jack where the headphones goes barely keeps the cable inside. I thought this was a flaw with the first set i received so I returned it. The replacement pair had te same issue, it's a design flaw. Save your money, get a BOHM pair instead.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones Yet!
customer_reviews.text: Husband uses these to listen to audio books while mowing the lawn, and absolutley LOVES them.
customer_reviews.author: bag382

customer_reviews.title: Physical break after one year
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were pretty good, not spectacular, but provided satisfactory fidelity. My disappointment and rating is the result of durability. One year to the day after purchase, one earpiece dislocated from the headband at its swivel joint, because the stem tab that inserts into the headband cracked while removing the headphones. I am very gentle with this kind of equipment and never abusive. This broke under normal use and I believe represents very poor craftsmanship for a $250 headphone. To replace, I'll look to another manufacture.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are a gift and the recipient is quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: NR

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, good noise canceling capability
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, good noise canceling capability. I'm not an audiophile but I do appreciate well balanced sound. I'm typically a Bose fan but I'm really happy with these and would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Destramp

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars on a good day
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I purchased this to by my gym / airplane headset... Every time I lay down on a bench at the gym these fall off my head unless I move the band over my forehead. The sound quality is a solid 7.5 out of 10, but I could still hear airplane noise when traveling. And the bottom of my earlobes don't fit inside the cups... Starting to wonder why I am give the product three stars...
customer_reviews.author: Jon Jones

customer_reviews.title: Sony reliable quality as always
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome sound quality and terrific comfort. Best value for money compared to other headsets in this class.
customer_reviews.author: Jaybird

customer_reviews.title: Noise cancelling not very effective.
customer_reviews.text: Noise canceling function very inefficient. I had a Bose and this Sony product cannot compare in that field. Not effective at all. Rest of functions OK.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: I really like this headphones
customer_reviews.text: I really like this headphones. They are very comfortable to wear (already used them on a long trip) and they do a decent job at cancelling noises. The Bluetooth connection is solid and I had no issues pairing them with several of my devices. I didn't use them to make a phone call yet but I'll keep you posted when I do. I wish the noise cancelling was better but it's not terrible and the training future is not very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These headphones rock, the noise canceling works very well and they sound awesome. Not audiophile level but the convenience of them being cable free is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones and all
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones and all, really great sound, comes with Bluetooth and wire. I highly recommend this, but does really cancel noise
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandr Chernyy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and easy to use. Syncing is very fast with my iPhone and Android phones. Battery life is good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge J.

customer_reviews.title: The mower roar is still too loud to enjoy my music
customer_reviews.text: I bought it thinking that it could effectively cancel the sound of my gas mower while doing gardening chores, but it could not. The mower roar is still too loud to enjoy my music. However, I still like the convenience of wireless Bluetooth use.
customer_reviews.author: Sal Cachola

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, I think I have found what I've been searching for.
customer_reviews.author: fabmel2

customer_reviews.title: Great headphone~
customer_reviews.text: It;s sound and blutooth is great !!! but the size of this item is small for me and I checked four stars.
customer_reviews.author: An Gwang Ryung

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but...
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good but NOT very good noise canceling. Also the most disappointing thing is that they stopped taking a charge after about 6 months. So now they are nothing more than paper weights. Contacting Sony to see if they will do anything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Deck

customer_reviews.title: Such a disappointment! And now its too late to send them ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately after having these for 2 and a half months these headphones won't charge. I only used them a few times too. Such a disappointment! And now its too late to send them back to Amazon. So I have to contact Sony I guess and try to see what they can do. I can still use them with the cord and they are nice otherwise, but I bought them specifically to be wireless.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Smith Ransone

customer_reviews.title: Great high notes
customer_reviews.text: Great high notes, amazing mids, but there is hardly any bass,you can hear so so there is good balance to most rock and "indie" songs but dubstep and hip-hop/rap do not work well. Noise cancelling is great at cancelling out air conditioning sounds at office.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound quality, but a bit on the pricey side. Also, the noise cancellation and microphone could be better. Other than that, these are wonderful headphones by Sony. They are Bluetooth ready and can also be plugged in for ease of use. You CAN use these while charging.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Grider

customer_reviews.title: Headphones stopped producing sound out of right side
customer_reviews.text: These headphones worked fine for about a year and then all of sudden the sound stopped working out of the right headphone. On top of that, customer support was not helpful. Do not buy these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Won't charge! worked very well for a year with limited use!
customer_reviews.author: BenSaeed

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: All you need to know: it has NFC capabilities. Tap your phone to your left ear and its instantly connected. Awesome. Plus it's wireless, has good battery life, adaptive active noise cancelling, and better sound quality than my wired Bose headphones. I plan on buying a second pair for work.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Ohashi

customer_reviews.title: Noise canceling
customer_reviews.text: The music s kinds great and the Bluetooth is great. The noise canceling part isn't that great
customer_reviews.author: dcatmoon

customer_reviews.title: Sony MDRZX770BN Bluetooth and Noise Canceling Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love them, very comfortable. I like the over the ear style.
customer_reviews.author: Vette girl

customer_reviews.title: Horribly nonlinear and non-flat frequency response.
customer_reviews.text: Horribly nonlinear and non-flat frequency response. All I can hear is the bass.
customer_reviews.author: benb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is strong and I am very satisfied. I have a very good feeling getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Jinwoo Song

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these headphones. I prefer a cleaner sound without overpowering base. These headphones deliver on that. Bluetooth works great with my Mac as well as my iOS devices. And I love the fact that if the batteries become exhausted you can use the included headphone cable to continue listening to music.
customer_reviews.author: R.L. Olson II

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are a little too bass. Would prefer a somewhat clearer sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They sound good and work fine but the bass is lacking and ...
customer_reviews.text: They sound good and work fine but the bass is lacking and the noise canceling feature does not work. I you want bluetooth and bass from an over the ear headphone get the Sony MDRxb950bt
customer_reviews.author: theHulq

customer_reviews.title: these headphones are great. They sound as good as Bose and Beats
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these headphones are great. They sound as good as Bose and Beats, have more features, and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not as good as I had hope for noise reduction
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Jackson

customer_reviews.title: The box was missing both charging and 3. 5mm ...
customer_reviews.text: The box was missing both charging and 3.5mm aux cable, and I returned it as soon as I received it.
customer_reviews.author: MSAmazon Customer Verified1

customer_reviews.title: Paying for new and getting used ones.
customer_reviews.text: I received a used headphones! The box was open, inside the cables were a mess and the headphones over the blue bands had some red spots that smelled like lipstick. I returned.
customer_reviews.author: E. Madiedo

product_meta.title: Sony MDRZX770BN Bluetooth and Noise Canceling Headset (Black)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackIt doesn't get any better: superior sound, comfort, and wireless freedom, with digital noise canceling. Bring out tight beats with 40mm drivers and Beat Response Control and stream it all wirelessly with Bluetooth technology, NFC connectivity. Cord Length: 3.94 ft; Frequency Response: 8–22,000 Hz; Volume Sensor: Yes
feature_bullets: Convenient 4-way usage w/Bluetooth & noise cancelling, Bluetooth audio streaming with AAC and aptX support, Convenient One-touch pairing with NFC, Digital Noise Canceling reduces ambient noise.Connectivity Technology: Wireless
Built-in microphone for hands-free phone calling, Rechargeable battery for up to 13hrs music, Passive mode for normal operation without battery usage
40mm drivers deliver rich, full sound, Beat Response Control for tight bass/transient response, Comfortable swiveling, around the ear design, Pouch, USB charging cable, and audio cable included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars202 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
